definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to walk (side part of split character)
timely/apt to the occasion/in due course

sentences.english: Pray for Pastor Don Baron who was sick and felt dizzy on last Sunday while he was preaching.
sentences.chinese: 爲柏大恩牧師禱告，上主日講道時他感到身體不適。

sentences.english: If so, Mr Cameron is well-placed.
sentences.chinese: 事實若真如此，那麼卡梅倫則是身居“適”職。

sentences.english: Firm mouth. Structured ready to drink wine.
sentences.chinese: 口感結實，結構嚴密，是一款適飲酒。

sentences.english: What kind of business suit to do ISO9001 quality management certification?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的企業適合辦ISO9001理質量管理認證？

sentences.english: The origin of the suitability and the amenity were studied and the essence of design was reverted.
sentences.chinese: 通過對“適”和“宜”起源的探究，還原設計的本質。

sentences.english: At last, we give the well-posed of some special population equations.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出幾種特殊的人口方程的穩態解的適定性。

sentences.english: To solve this problem, it is necessary to use such pigging technology that is suitable for the vari-sized pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 要解決這個問題，需採用適應變經管道的清管技術。

sentences.english: Maybe globulars go on forming whenever conditions permit.
sentences.chinese: 也許在條件適當時，球狀星團便會不斷地形成。

sentences.english: In case of illness, please notify your employer.
The results of this study offer the theoretical foundation for the study of O. violaceus's adaptiblity to Karst.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果爲諸葛菜的喀斯特適生性的研究提供依據。

sentences.english: If you have a paper jam, make sure you clear the jammed paper properly.
sentences.chinese: 如果卡紙，你要確定適本地將卡紙清除。

sentences.english: The effect of a temperature gradient should be included where appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 適當時應包括溫度梯度效應。

sentences.english: If appropriate, the minimum change within the nomenclature that meets this criterion.
sentences.chinese: 在適當時，稅則目錄中符合此標準的最小變化。

sentences.english: The well-posedness of time-delayed forward-backward stochastic differential equations is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了帶時滯正倒向隨機微分方程的適定性問題。

sentences.english: But the left-back says he is acclimatising to the change from France's Ligue 1 to pace of the Premiership.
sentences.chinese: 但這名左後衛表示他正在適應從法甲到英超的改變。

sentences.english: Diluting agent has certain transparency for ink multi-color overprint.
sentences.chinese: 沖淡劑具有必定的透明量，適分油不朱的衆色疊印。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
